titleStmt.title: Honorable entertainments compos'de for the seruice of this noble cittie. Some of which were fashion'd for the entertainment of the Lords of his Maiesties most Honorable Priuie Councell, vpon the occasion of their late royall employment. Inuented by Thomas Middlevon [sic].
titleStmt.author: Middleton, Thomas, d. 1627.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of a photostat of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
